/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene contrast to the busy scene below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
